root.name: Boxyboy
root.description: OverviewBoxyboy is a puzzle game developed by Media Rings and published by NEC Home Electronics for the TurboGrafx-16 platform.In Japan Boxyboy is known as Sokoban World and is an official part of the Sokoban series.GameplayBoxyboy plays just like other games in the Sokoban series where the player controls a worker in a warehouse. The goal of each level is to push the crates on to the squares with the yellow dots on them.Boxyboy also features a level editor for players to create and play their own levels.
